backend.integrations.integration_item module

class backend.integrations.integration_item.IntegrationItem(id: str | None = None, type: str | None = None, directory: bool = False, parent_path_or_name: str | None = None, parent_id: str | None = None, name: str | None = None, creation_time: datetime | None = None, last_modified_time: datetime | None = None, url: str | None = None, children: List[str] | None = None, mime_type: str | None = None, delta: str | None = None, drive_id: str | None = None, visibility: bool | None = True, email: str | None = None, phone_number: str | None = None, company_name: str | None = None, employment_role: str | None = None, lead_status: str | None = None, location: str | None = None, domain: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Represents a generalized item from an integration (e.g., a file, a database, a contact).

This class standardizes the metadata for various integration items, allowing for consistent handling across different platforms like Airtable, Notion, or HubSpot.

Parameters:

  • id (Optional[str]) – Unique identifier for the item.

  • type (Optional[str]) – The type of the item (e.g., “file”, “database”, “contact”, “Base”, “Table”).

  • directory (bool) – True if the item is a directory/container, False otherwise. Defaults to False.

  • parent_path_or_name (Optional[str]) – Path or name of the parent item.

  • parent_id (Optional[str]) – ID of the parent item.

  • name (Optional[str]) – Name of the item.

  • creation_time (Optional[datetime]) – Timestamp of item creation.

  • last_modified_time (Optional[datetime]) – Timestamp of last modification.

  • url (Optional[str]) – URL to access the item.

  • children (Optional[List[str]]) – List of child item IDs (for directory-like items).

  • mime_type (Optional[str]) – MIME type of the item (e.g., “application/pdf”).

  • delta (Optional[str]) – Field for tracking changes or deltas (integration-specific).

  • drive_id (Optional[str]) – ID of the drive or workspace (e.g., Google Drive).

  • visibility (Optional[bool]) – True if the item is visible, False otherwise. Defaults to True.

  • email (Optional[str]) – Email address associated with the item (e.g., for contacts).

  • phone_number (Optional[str]) – Phone number associated with the item (e.g., for contacts).

  • company_name (Optional[str]) – Company name associated with the item.

  • employment_role (Optional[str]) – Employment role or job title.

  • lead_status (Optional[str]) – Lead status (e.g., for CRM contacts).

  • location (Optional[str]) – Geographical location.

  • domain (Optional[str]) – Associated domain.

__init__(id: str | None = None, type: str | None = None, directory: bool = False, parent_path_or_name: str | None = None, parent_id: str | None = None, name: str | None = None, creation_time: datetime | None = None, last_modified_time: datetime | None = None, url: str | None = None, children: List[str] | None = None, mime_type: str | None = None, delta: str | None = None, drive_id: str | None = None, visibility: bool | None = True, email: str | None = None, phone_number: str | None = None, company_name: str | None = None, employment_role: str | None = None, lead_status: str | None = None, location: str | None = None, domain: str | None = None)[source]
to_clean_dict()[source]

Converts the IntegrationItem object to a dictionary, removing None values and default boolean values (False for directory, True for visibility).

Returns:

A dictionary representation of the IntegrationItem.

Return type:

dict
